nodes.text: The Mechanics Union Auxiliary Meeting Hall, or more simply the Mechanics Union Hall or Union Hall, was a secondary meeting location for members of the Ugnaught Mechanics Union. The hall was located in the city of Ugnorgrad on the Ugnaught Surface and could be seen from the Action Tidings Tower. It was connected to Tralkov's Bar via underground tunnels.
The primary meeting hall was located in Cloud City's Mining Quarter.
